about_the_game:
Bring cool chills and vibe to your game with this futuristic and ambient pack. Spacious, relaxing, at times eerie and unsettling with a touch of Asian and Japanese influences.

The music themes in this pack range from creepy dreamscapes to dramatic temple ambience to futuristic cyberpunk.

Whether you want to add just a small spooky vibe or to create a cool futuristic mood for your game project, Matsurigami Slave to Convention is an excellent starting point.

Track List

01 Beast in the Dark
02 Priestess of Inugami
03 Vase
04 Sanctuary
05 Beat in the dark
06 Consanguinity
07 The lock of Zenkoji
08 Tosa 7 color Dyecloth
09 Tosa 7 color Dyecloth (long version)
10 Ancestral Festival
11 Burned Down
12 Cemetery
13 A Woman Caught in a Convention
14 Inugami
15 Miki (pf version)
16 Miki
17 Life in Omine
18 Main Street
19 Mountain Walking
20 Spring
